name: A Date With Joxe1
description:
In this short adventure, you get to have one of the best days of your LIFE next to Joxe!

Inspired by "A Date with Markiplier", I wanted to make a decision based game, where even the  little tiny smol decisions can change the game and ending!

You have 3 complete different places to choose from where  you can spend the day!
You can go to places like:

● The Mall

● The Forest

●The Beach

Every place has unique and fun activities!
And each activity has their own cool place
Depending on what you do, you'll get different endings, get them all and find out the truth behind...Well...I am not going to spoil it...

This is my first game ever, done in 2 weeks (+ the OST, the whole project was done in 2 weeks)

You can listen to the WHOLE OST over on Spotify, YouTube Music and EVERYWHERE ELSE!
Just search for "A Date With Joxe1 OST" in your prefered music service!
Or just click here!

I know it is pretty simple, but this is my first game ever and I did the best I could :D          I promise my next game will be WAAAY bigger and better B)

this was just a fun little project I wanted to try doing :D

Also, if I see that you guys really like the game, I can work on an Android release!
Just make sure to share the game with your friends!

Don't Forget to Subscribe to my YouTube and Follow my Insta (i upload stories every day!)

I also stream over on Twitch! Make sure to follow me there as well!
(I make cool events over there, this game, for example, was played by chat! They would vote where or what to do next and see what ending they would get!)

Thank you a bunch for downloading! Hope you enjoy! <3
